website_summaries.verdict: The bar stool style most people remember with the addition of a comfortable weathered platform to sit on.
pros: Different level foot supports and heights are extremely kid-friendly
These features make this one of the best options for whole family use
cons: Sitting surfaces smaller than most barstools available

customer_reviews.title: Deal for the money
customer_reviews.text: These stools are a bargain. I am not a tiny guy (6'5" and 270lbs). I know that I'm over what the stools say they can handle, but after 4ish weeks of almost daily use they are still as solid as day one. I'm certain if I ever have an issue it's gonna be due to overweight issues, but at 70 bucks a pair I won't lose sleep about replacing them in a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: DarkPsonic

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking, but double check parts before using!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets (so 4 total) of these stools for my basement bar. The stools look great and feel fairly comfortable which is why I am giving them any stars at all. Three of them wobble pretty bad, which won't be too bad to fix by putting felt pad sliders on the legs so they slide on tile easier (and less noisy). The main reason for star deductions was that 1 stool didn't have any screws holding it together at all! Luckily I had 4 screws lying around the house that were similar enough to the ones used (found out by taking a screw out of a different one) and that I checked before sitting down on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with a small pub table. They are a bit small - but that ended up working perfectly for me in the small area I needed to fit this stuff. Not the most comfortable things on this planet - but they are great "hang out for a minute while I wait for my shot" type of stools.
customer_reviews.author: IAMRAMEKIN

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but sturdy
customer_reviews.text: If you want bar stools that are comfy and sturdy but not bulky, buy these. I did a lot of research to find bar stools and a lot of the cheaper ones got complaints that they did not seem sturdy and creaked when you sat on them. These do not have that problem. The cushion is decent looking quality fake leather. Easy to move around since they are lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: PharmStudent

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These stools are awesome. They are solid wood and sturdy. They are very nice looking, great color, and the cushioned seats are so comfortable. We use them for playing guitar, so we got the tall ones (30"), but for a counter or table sitting, you'd probably need the 24". Just check height before ordering. They also come fully assembled and well packaged. This was a great purchase in every way. We are ordering more.
customer_reviews.author: Lili

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable barstools
customer_reviews.text: The bar table we ordered was higher than expected so we had to find taller bar stools, without breaking the bank. These exceeded expectations in terms of quality and comfort; they're really solid and the cushion is thicker and more comfortable that we'd thought. They were packaged really well and arrived in 2 days, also more than we expected. One stool had a slight wobble but a felt pad under one leg solved it. Overall we're really satisfied with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: HereKitty

customer_reviews.title: Quality + Price = Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: These barstools are exactly as described, and I love that there is zero assembly required! Great quality and affordable, will likely purchase another pair for our new table!
customer_reviews.author: SteffySueHayz

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical after reading the mixed reviews and was prepared if they didn't live up to my expectations. They arrived sooner than promised and are amazingly nice. We use them regularly and no issues with level or padding of seat cushions. They are a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mical Caterina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and sturdy. They go great with my kitchen island. My mistake, I didn’t measure correctly and the ones I got are really tall. But the kids still love them lol! Highly recommended. Also don’t for get to measure lol!
customer_reviews.author: Paul C Cordova III

customer_reviews.title: Too small for even average height.
customer_reviews.text: I like the color and style. I dislike how short it was when I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: LaRaven

customer_reviews.title: Cushion quality lacking.
customer_reviews.text: One of them held up the cushion of the other became squished and flat and started to poke out of the side
customer_reviews.author: cbf

customer_reviews.title: Really nice for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very happy. Use them while I teach dance, one in each studio. They look good, arrived in great shape, feel sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: dancermom

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stools already assembled. Good craftmanship and sturdy. Can't beat the price. Hard to buy already assembled furniture these days.
customer_reviews.author: Jane102

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for the bar in my hubby's man room. He loves them. They're good quality and very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: cmart

customer_reviews.title: They look nice under my counter
customer_reviews.text: They meet my needs for occasional seating. They are weight rated. So be mindful of that.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Dillman

customer_reviews.title: Great from start to finish
customer_reviews.text: From browsing for stools to the second we unboxed them... the experience has been great! My favorite thing about these stools is they came FULLY assembled! Great quality and super comfy. True to size and work great for high counters.
customer_reviews.author: ALMS

customer_reviews.title: The best quality for your money
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed for the price .. they look so great in my home . Also for the price , they look like I could have paid more .. I love them as well because they came assemble already to go ... Christmas at my home was great because of them

customer_reviews.title: Decent height

customer_reviews.author: SLR

customer_reviews.text: You get exactly what you pay for. These were bought to go in our pool room and while they are not super comfortable they work well for the room they are in.

customer_reviews.title: Great chairs
customer_reviews.text: Awesome value, nice looking barstools. Perfect for what we needed.

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Was Looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Came fully assembled ... took out of the box a placed at my counter. They look great a feel like they'll hold up. Just what I was looking for!

customer_reviews.title: Seats are a little hard after sitting down for a while

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.text: These stools are great. Perfect height bar stools, worked perfect for our basement games area. Lovely dark brown wood.

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I love these stools. They are charming and look very nice. They are a great buy for the price. I was very impressed. They look much better in person than on the website.

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Love these stools, very sturdy and comfortable. We use them all the time. Great value and best of all they come assembled.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height
customer_reviews.text: These chairs are even better than expected! In the picture the leather seat appears to be brown, but they're actually more close to black, which matches our dark brown wood and black leather seat dining room chairs perfectly. These chairs fit nicely around our breakfast nook and are a comfortable height.

customer_reviews.title: Cats
customer_reviews.text: They came already put together , honestly so awesome . My cats will run and jump on them and knock them over but a big cat will do that to most stools .

customer_reviews.title: Anyone over 200lbs I wouldnt recommend. Had a friend sit in one and it ...
customer_reviews.text: Would be ok for very light usage. Anyone over 200lbs I wouldnt recommend. Had a friend sit in one and it busted and he it the ground.

customer_reviews.title: Price is right.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for kitchen use. The seats are rather small so anyone overweight might have difficulty. But price is right!

customer_reviews.text: These are very good stools...and the color went with my kitchen perfect...

customer_reviews.text: What's not to like? Comfortable, looks nice, and it's a great value! The stool already comes assembled. Loved this so much, I bought 4!

customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, looks expensive, and ridiculously comfortable. Just buy them you won’t regret it!

customer_reviews.text: These are attractive stools, a very good value for the money. But both stools wobble significantly!

customer_reviews.title: Not great but, decent.
customer_reviews.text: For the price don't expect greatness but, they are decent. We've only had ours for a week and the cheap polyurethane seats are already deformed.
customer_reviews.author: Burnabout

customer_reviews.title: Worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Super good quality especially for the price. It looks fancier in person and much taller than expected but that’s just a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! Even delivered in 2 days and didn’t ask for it. Strong, nice color shade, plush. Great deal.

customer_reviews.title: sturdy chairs
customer_reviews.text: stools are sturdy and well made. they are great when you need extra seating for company around an island. would recommend. great price to.

customer_reviews.title: Love these so much but some of them are a ...
customer_reviews.text: Love these so much but some of them are a little off, like they dont sit flat on a hard floor. For the price though it is a good find, theyre comfortable and seem sturdy.

customer_reviews.title: On time and undamaged.
customer_reviews.text: The items were shipped on time, arrived undamaged, and are very nice.

customer_reviews.title: My great uncle actually fell to the floor when it collapsed ...
customer_reviews.text: Both of these low quality stools literally fell apart after two weeks of use!!! My great uncle actually fell to the floor when it collapsed from under him. We tried re-gluing them with every possible glue on the market to no avail. They're horrible and should no longer be sold. I will be asking for my money back.

customer_reviews.text: Ordered these because they seemed to have good reviews for the price. We are very happy with them for the price we paid and they look nice. Arrived assembled and completely intact and good shape.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 sets of these and they are exactly what I was looking for. They tuck nicely under the bar area granite counter top.

customer_reviews.text: The seat is actually more soft and comfortable than I expected. The packing was not great but good enough to allow the item to arrived safely without any damage.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome stools.

customer_reviews.text: Great quality stools. Impressed for the price. Bought 2 more in a smaller size. Perfect for kitchens or game rooms!

customer_reviews.text: Good quality but one of the 2 came with a catch across the top of the leather. I'm disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: What I love about this order is
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this order is, the stools arrived assembled. I am not to handy, I do not buy anything that I have to put together my self.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy without purchase!

customer_reviews.title: nicked, wobbly
customer_reviews.text: These stools look very nice, online. The cushions are nice too. I only had to pull one stool out of the box - it had 9 nicks on the legs. And it wobbled. I decided to measure the legs and found a difference in length of 1/16". May not seem like a lot, but at 30" inches away (the seeting surface), it is unnerving and unpleasent to sit on. Too bad, I used points on this purchase. Double the dissapointment.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Vernam

customer_reviews.title: Nice for quick meals at the counter!

product_meta.title: Winsome Wood Marta Assembled Round Bar Stool with PU Leather Cushion Seat and Square Legs, 30.3-Inch, Set of 2
feature_bullets: Marta Set of 2 Bar Stool with Dark Brown PU Leather Cushion with Antique Walnut Solid Wood Legs
Fully assembled stands at 13.58"W x 13.58"D x 30.31"H
Perfect for any room in the house
Seat diameter is 13" with cushion of 2.30" thick
